data.description: create GUI applications for disabled people
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
AAC is the common abbreviation for Augmentive and Adaptive
    Computing. In other words, everything that has to do with making
    computing easier for people with disabilities. Based upon my work
    with pVoice - a speechapplication for severely disabled people, I
    created a set of modules to make it easier to create similar
    applications. Thus I called them AAC::Pvoice
